casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Xavier Dominique JOHNSON. No. 72P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 639 S.E.2d 78 . The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of March 2007 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal": "Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
